title: Russia: Citi Sets New Standard for Cash Back
summary: Moscow - Citi announces the introduction of a new standard for its Cash Back offer. Now clients who hold Cash Back cards can receive up to 5 percent of the value of each purchase in certain categories of retail outlets, the list of which will be updated every 3 months. At the end of every year, clients will receive an additional reward - a 10 percent annual bonus on top of the total sum of cash-back rewards received during the course of the year.
tag-1: Russia: Citi Sets New Standard for Cash Back
tag-2: Moscow – Citi announces the introduction of a new standard for its Cash Back offer. Now clients who hold Cash Back cards can receive up to 5 percent of the value of each purchase in certain categories of retail outlets, the list of which will be updated every 3 months. At the end of every year, clients will receive an additional reward – a 10 percent annual bonus on top of the total sum of cash-back rewards received during the course of the year.
tag-3: "For 10 years now, we have offered our Russian clients groundbreaking innovations in the credit card business," noted Yuri Topunov, Credit Cards Business Head for Citi Russia. "We were the first bank to issue a cash back card in Russia in 2007. This is probably the simplest and most comprehensible type of credit card, and it continues to be in high demand. Today I am pleased to offer our clients a new format of this product."
tag-4: The new version of the Cash Back World MasterCard will include all the customary elements which are accessible for Citi credit card holders, including:
tag-5: The opportunity to receive 1 percent cash back on all purchases remains in place. Annual service fee for the card is RUB 1,199. Maximum credit line is RUB 300,000, interest rate ranges from 19.5 percent to 27.9 percent.
tag-6: In order to take advantage of these new opportunities, clients do not need to have their card reissued. All holders of CASH BACK cards will automatically be subscribed to the new programs starting December 1.*
tag-7: *The exact amount of the cash back reward is determined by Citi at its discretion and based on the duration of the card as specified in the agreement with the client. Information on Citi, amount of cash back, rules, order and terms of its repayment, as well as all terms and conditions of the credit agreements are available at www.citibank.ru.
